required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Drug-drug Interaction Study of SHR6390 on Healthy Chinese Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Single-dose, Open-label and Self-control Study to Evaluate the Effect of Efavirenz on Pharmacokinetic of SHR6390 in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study is a single-center, open, single-dose, self-controlled clinical trial. It is planned to enroll 20 healthy adult subjects.Subjects will take the SHR6390 on Day1 and Day22 , and from Day8 to Day26 take the efavirenz.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The study is a single-center, open, single-dose, self-controlled clinical trial.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 22 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Time to maximum observed serum concentration (Tmax) for SHR6390 after Single dose.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 22 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed serum concentration (Cmax)for SHR6390 after Single dose.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 22 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC0-t) for SHR6390 after Single dose.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 22 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC0-inf ) for SHR6390 after Single dose.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 22 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Time to elimination half-life (T1/2) for for SHR6390 after Single dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events and severity of adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 34 after the first dose

intervention.description: SHR6390 tablet single dose；Efavirenz single dose.
